text: Petropavlovsk () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Petropavlovskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 588 as of 2010. There are 8 streets. == Geography == It is located 21 km west from Bolshaya Sosnova. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Petropavlovsk, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai
